## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                          | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `display` | `display` | Allows the tag to be displayed as different level while preserving the accessible heading structure. | `number` | `undefined` |
| `level`   | `level`   | Heading Level                                                                                        | `number` | `2`         |
